# id: AvroProducer -> @Override     public void process(final Exchange exchange) throws Exception
commentText: Processes the message exchange__@param exchange the message exchange_@throws Exception if an internal processing error has occurred.
codeText: @Override_    public void process(final Exchange exchange) throws Exception {_        Object request = exchange.getIn().getBody()___        if (transceiver == null) {_            transceiver = createTranceiver()__            requestor = new AvroRequestor(getEndpoint().getProtocol(), transceiver)__        }__        requestor.request(exchange.getIn().getHeader(AvroConstants.AVRO_MESSAGE_NAME, String.class), wrapObjectToArray(request), new Callback<Object>() {__            @Override_            public void handleResult(Object result) {_                exchange.getOut().setBody(result)__            }__            @Override_            public void handleError(Throwable error) {_                exchange.setException(error)__            }_        })__    }
